description: This file defines an Angular component named TopbarComponent that provides a top bar with quick actions like create and search. It manages event emitters for create and search actions, and handles input events related to searching.

classes.name: TopbarComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that displays a top navigation bar with create and search functionalities.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Emits the create event when the create action is triggered.

methods.name: onSearch
methods.description: Emits the search event with the given search term.

methods.name: onSearchInput
methods.description: Handles input event from the search box, extracts the search term, and triggers the onSearch method.

ctags.name: input
ctags.pattern: /^    const input = (event && event.target) ? (event.target as any) : null;$/

ctags.name: input
ctags.pattern: /^    const value: string = input && typeof input.value === 'string' ? input.value : '';$/

ctags.name: value
ctags.pattern: /^    const value: string = input && typeof input.value === 'string' ? input.value : '';$/
